original_text:
For the stars of the heavens and their constellations
    will not give their light;
the sun will be dark at its rising,
    and the moon will not shed its light.
korean_text: 하늘의 별들과 별 무리가 그 빛을 내지 아니하며 해가 돋아도 어두우며 달이 그 빛을 비추지 아니할 것이로다

sentences.original_text: For the stars of the heavens and their constellations
the sun will be dark at its rising
and the moon will not shed its light.
sentences.korean_translation: 달은 그 빛을 비추지 않을 것입니다
